text: midneunjadeul-iyeo jug-eum-i neohui ege dolaehaess-eul ttae jeung-in-eul dula haess geoneul neohui gaunde dumyeong-ui jung-in-eul dugeona ttoneun daleun salam gaundeseo dumyeong-eul dueoya ham-ila neohuiga yeo haengjung-e iss-eul ttae imjong-i neohuiege ileuleoss-euna geudeul-i uisimseuleoeul ttae neun yebae hue geu dul-eul bulleo geudeul lo hayeogeum hananim-eul dugo maengseha ge hala uliga gakkaun chincheog-ila haljilado heowiui mogs-eul gaj-ji anh-eul geos-imyeo ttohan hananim ap-eseo jeung-geo leul gamchuji anihani man-il uliga geuleohge handamyeon ulineun joeag-eulo gadeugchage doel geos-ibnida lago maengse hadeola
